title: Three 'Must Haves' For Farm Equipment Dealers Just Getting Into Precision Equipment

tasks.task: Becoming a trusted Precision Ag dealer for farmers.
subtasks: Demonstrating dedication to the service by understanding growers' needs.
Staying current with technological advancements and providing ongoing training.
Collaborating closely with customers to optimize equipment performance.

tasks.task: Implementing Blue Delta dealer program strategies.
subtasks: Providing specialized support and resources to elite Precision Ag dealers.
Promoting participating dealers and enhancing their visibility.
Offering enhanced service and support for Blue Delta dealers.

tasks.task: Sharing case studies and best practices in Precision Ag technology.
subtasks: Researching and curating EHR stories (Electronic Health Records).
Featuring customer testimonials and success cases in marketing efforts.
Utilizing platform capabilities (like banners) to highlight dealership activities.

tasks.task: Leveraging online and offline channels for outreach.
subtasks: Implementing digital marketing strategies for the dealership.
Engaging customers through regular communications and support.
